pages.text:
About Dog Pub Social
Dog Pub Social
is Dunedin‚Äôs first-ever off-leash dog park and bar concept. A Pooch Pass is required for each dog to enter and can be purchased on-site as a single-day or multi-day pass. Humans always enter free and can enjoy full-liquor drinks, handcrafted cocktails, local brews, wine, cannabis-infused beverages, mocktails, and tasty food for both pups and their people.
The Dog Pub Social features multiple off-leash play areas designed for fun and safety. Each area includes 6-foot fencing, double-gated entries and exits, playground equipment, toys, puppy pools, and artificial turf to help keep pups clean. All play zones are monitored by DPS staff to ensure a safe and tidy environment.
At Dog Pub Social, we strive to be more than just a dog bar‚Äîwe‚Äôre proud to be a part of the
DOGEDIN
community. We host breed-specific meetups, rescue events, fundraisers, social hours, wine tastings, fitness and yoga classes, live music, and televised sporting events.
Meet the Founder
J.P. Brewer
brings over 20 years of experience in both the dog care and hospitality industries. As the founder of
Dog Bar Charlotte
and
Dog Bar St. Pete
, and former owner of two doggy daycares and multiple bars in the St. Pete area, she‚Äôs passionate about creating fun, clean, and safe environments for dogs and their people. Dog Pub Social is her latest venture, continuing her mission to connect dog lovers through vibrant, pet-friendly social spaces.
FAQ
ü¶¥
Do I need a dog to visit Dog Pub Social?
Absolutely not! You just need to
love
dogs as much as we do.
ü¶¥
Can I bring children to DPS?
Due to insurance and safety regulations, all guests must be
21 or older
.
ü¶¥
How do I know my dog will be safe?
Play areas are supervised by our trained ‚Äú
Ruff-erees
.‚Äù However, dogs must be social and under their owner‚Äôs control at all times.
ü¶¥
Can I bring my dog‚Äôs toys or treats?
To avoid conflict and for safety reasons, personal toys and treats are not allowed.
ü¶¥
Are dogs required to be spayed or neutered?
Yes. All dogs over 1 year old must be spayed or neutered to enter the facility.
ü¶¥
Are vaccinations required?
Yes. All dogs must have current vaccinations from a veterinarian, including:
Rabies
Parvovirus
Bordetella
ü¶¥
Are there any breed restrictions?
We welcome all social, non-aggressive breeds.
